## A fancy plot made with Plotly!
### By EA

```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE, fig.cap='June 15, 2022'}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

 

g <- mpg %>%
  ggplot() + geom_smooth(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, linetype = drv))  
  
gg <- ggplotly(g)

gg
```
